channel.title: Allstar Source - Train - Barbarian Women Drops!?!?!
channel.description:
[b]Mhk, so, I made a brand new server 3 days ago, and found out that in the partyhats are only 5m in the source which is easily achievable, so I wanted to make it where its Admin+, so I removed them from the rare shop, but found out that barbarian women drop red phats!!!!! I want to get rid of them dropping those, how do I do it? And also, if you know any other things that drop phats, let me know and post how to remove it!
Thanks in advanced.
I want to know fast because I have a mod, a admin, a co owner, and myself as owner, so thats all the staff we are having until 20+ players, so I need to know fast before we get new players! [/b]

item.title: Allstar Source - Train - Barbarian Women Drops!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Cyborg101 Cyborg101
item.description:
@Cyborg101 wrote:

recker450:

allstar uses item2.java

I killed 36 of the barbâ€™s and none of them dropped a Party Hat after I edited it in the item2.java file. So, I think it worked,
Many thanks.

Read full topic
